translations.name: Modern Language Bible
translations.description: New Berkeley Version - This revision of The Berkeley Version, published under the editorship of Dr. Gerrit Verkuyl in 1959, attempts a faithful rendering of the original texts into lively modern English. Explanatory notes were revised as well. Topical headings were rephrased.
